Author: PartyTimeSexyDisco
Text: I just want to let you know there is 0 legal basis yo what your mother is saying, mine tried to pull the same kind of shit on me but I didn't listen and it turned out she was all bark and no bite. She's doing everything she can to make you dependent on her which she wouldnt do if she really loved you or cared about you. I know it's hard trying to get independent but I believe in you and your ability to become free of her in time <3 I was in the same situation years ago, moving out with no job, money, or friends - but I did it and my life has really gotten better since then. I live with my gf and our cats, in a flat we rent, have a job I mostly tolerate lol, have hobbies I enjoy, and I've slowly recovered from the trauma my parents inflicted on me.  Sorry for the wall of text this just really struck a chord. Feel free to DM me if you wanna chat, vent or ask about anything ðŸ’ž
